titleStmt.title: The king's request: or, Dauid's desire A sermon preached at the last generall fast holden at Yorke, the 21. of Aprill last. By Phinees Hodson Doctour of Diuinity, and Chancellour of the Metropoliticall Church of St. Peter-Yorke.
titleStmt.author: Hodson, Phineas, d. 1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Harper, for Edward Blount, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
